text: Please help me updating bootenv. I am setting up one for windows server. There is a bootenv for this os in default deployment of DR. I am trying to add missing files, wimboot file in particular. So I have copied the file into windows-2012r2/install directory, but it is still not found by the provisioner. What actions should be taken after adding missing files for bootenv. Thank you.
umm - that is about to be removed because we can’t really support it right now.  We haven’t built or tested it for a long time.  It also requires you to have built wimboot images and the like.
I really need to put out the next release because it isn’t really supported.
